entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow or ice pellets this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
